actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Intelligence.

official_title: A bill to establish a 10-year term for the position of Director of Central Intelligence and a 5-year term for the position of Deputy Director of Central Intelligence.

summary.text: Amends the National Security Act of 1947 to establish a ten-year term for the Director of the Central Intelligence Agency and a five-year term for the Deputy Director.

titles.title: A bill to establish a 10-year term for the position of Director of Central Intelligence and a 5-year term for the position of Deputy Director of Central Intelligence.
